website_summaries.verdict: You'll love these shoes' classic look that's ideal for warm weather, but the tradeoff is some quality issues that might be frustrating.
pros: Men are enthusiastic about these shoes' good-looking boat shoe style that is ideal for summertime, and looks nice with pants or shorts
cons: Some parts of the shoes have a "plastic," flimsy feel
A few complaints of them "squeaking," and of light-colored socks being stained after wearing them

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Order at least 1/2 size larger than normal shoes. I ordered a size 10 when I where 9-1/2 normally and fit perfectly. They did not rub my heal raw either. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoes with a fault
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for a business trip. Where I wanted a pair of shoes that could pass for business casual yet still look okay with shorts. These shoes definitely met those expectations. However avoid wearing these with white socks while doing a lot of walking. They will bleed blue as shown in the picture. Overall they fit true to size and would have gotten a 4th star from me if it weren't for the socks incident. A 5th star would require them to breathe a little bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Very cool sneakers but 3 stars because did not fit me for the sake of your size chart
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, is very nice, but unfortunately it did not fit me. I wear Size EUR-43 and UK-9, according to your size chart i was expecting that US-10 would fit me, but as i suspected from my previous experience i ordered size US-10 and still tightly narrow. I wish you improve on the wide on all kinds of shoes you make. I always buy from Aldo in UK and in South Africa but i never had problems with sizes, this is the 3rd time i by from US and i always have the same problem. I cannot go to US-11 because it will be like +1" longer for me. Please fix this.
customer_reviews.author: DukeMart77

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes. I am a 9.5 -10 in most shoes. Typically a 9.5 for Aldo shoes, so I went with that. When they first arrived I was concerned they might be just a tad to tight, but within 30 minutes of wear the leather softened up and they fit might foot perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo K

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but quality not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed these shoes and worn them several times. The "leather", or whatever material they are made from, is thin and not of great quality. I don't believe they are worth the price paid but I am satisfied with the show itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they squeak really loud and are super annoying. Haven't found a single thing yet to ...
customer_reviews.text: Got an 11 to be safe (i'm a 10.5) and they're too tight. Should have gotten 11.5. Also, they squeak really loud and are super annoying. Haven't found a single thing yet to get the squeaking to stop. They look nice, but are completely unwearable as they're too small and too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap shoes....lots of plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap shoes....lots of plastic. Looks good in the photos but once they arrived, you can tell they are cheaply made. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe! I normally wear an 11.5 in sneakers and decided to pick up a 12 in these. They are a bit snug but I expect them to loosen up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: eSos511

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are okay but somewhat small and rigid. Maybe they'll loosen up with use.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and affordable
customer_reviews.text: For the price I got them for they are really good, they look really nice and stylish you might want to go a size bigger than what you actually are tho
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're great. All I need is a boat to wear ...
customer_reviews.text: They're great. All I need is a boat to wear them with.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G.

customer_reviews.title: runs small maybe?
customer_reviews.text: still a great shoe, but did not fit my dad in his normal size, would get at least a half size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, since Topsiders are no good now, these fill the gap, mostly.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Johnson

customer_reviews.title: but not tight enough to be too painful (I can insert a finger between my heel and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally a size 11, purchased size 12. It's a little tight, but not tight enough to be too painful (I can insert a finger between my heel and the shoe). Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Tyree

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great experience
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered as stated. Great product and great experience. I will definitely continue my shopping at amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ChristianP

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great quality
customer_reviews.text: I would buy these shoes in every color if I could. Great price for great quality. Highly suggest.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron K

customer_reviews.title: and the 13 fits like an 11
customer_reviews.text: Sending them back. Tried this brand for the first time, and the 13 fits like an 11. WAY TOO SMALL. Not cut right at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wright

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe, bought for summer and haven't worn them yet!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubster couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my husband. I did bought a size bigger as the other reviewers suggested. Husband likes the fit and the style so much that he wants the black one too.
customer_reviews.author: gsmith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: shoes of bad quality and the worst that are imitations of aldo a put and are already ugly
customer_reviews.author: jon ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: The back came up after 1 wear. But great looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: christopher cip

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable look
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend. He loved them! They go great with shorts, jeans, pants . Comfortable fit! He's very satisfied with the purchase .
customer_reviews.author: IC

customer_reviews.title: but the shoe is comfortable. I have flat feet
customer_reviews.text: Not entirely durable. The tops of the shoes are peeling away, but the shoe is comfortable. I have flat feet, so this shoe has a low rise, making it easier to tolerate walking in all day.
customer_reviews.author: JPH

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feel a little tight they work, hope they stretch out a little.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Schutz
